| HistoryText             = Armed Response was a group of individuals given suits based on that of [[Stuart Clarke (Earth-616)|Rampage]]. They were employed by [[Lady Lotus (Earth-616)|Lotus Newmark]] as a security group, designed to deal with gang members and slowly gained the confidence of [[Los Angeles]] residents. Lotus was funding the gang members as well, escalating the conflict on both sides for her own ends.{{r|Wonder Man Vol 2 #16|19}} They were ultimately exposed by the [[Crazy Eight (Team)|Crazy Eight]] and Wonder Man.{{r|Wonder Man Vol 2 #21}}
